Class ClosureCommandLineCompiler

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class ClosureCommandLineCompiler
extends DefaultCommandLineCompiler
    ClosureCommandLineCompiler is the command-line compiler for Closure Stylesheets.
    Author:
    bolinfest@google.com (Michael Bolin)
